You’ve failed your first mission from the Senate. Poor performance administrator!
The Senate is pleased with your progress, you’ve completed your first Senate Mission
Expanded your level 1 low income dwelling into a level 2 dwelling
Expanded your level 2 low income dwelling into a level 3 dwelling
Expanded your level 3 low income dwelling into a level 4 dwelling
Expanded your level 1 medium income dwelling into a level 2 dwelling
Expanded your level 2 medium income dwelling into a level 3 dwelling
Expanded your level 3 medium income dwelling into a level 4 dwelling
Expanded your level 1 high income dwelling into a level 2 dwelling
Expanded your level 2 high income dwelling into a level 3 dwelling
Expanded your level 3 high income dwelling into a level 4 dwelling
Good work administrator, you’ve saved up over 10,000 Denari in your treasury
You’ve saved up over 25,000 Denari in your treasury, your financial management has impressed the Senate
With over 50,000 Denari in reserves, the Senate looks to you for strong fiscal guidance and leadership
The Senate is in awe at your outstanding fiscal management. You’ve saved up over 100,000 Denari
You’ve helped create homes for over 2,500 citizens across the Empire. Great work administrator
Your keen civic management has helped create homes for more than 5,000 citizens! Outstanding work
Your keen civic management across the Empire has created more than 200,000 Denari. These riches help expand the Glory of Rome.
You’ve earned over 1,500 Denari in a single month. Great work administrator
You’ve established a settlement earning over 2,500 Denari a month. This great fiscal achievement has not gone unnoticed.
You’ve created an industrial powerhouse, earning over 3,500 Denari a month. Outstanding work.
You’ve helped create over 500 dwellings for low income citizens in the Empire.
You’ve helped create over 100 dwellings for your medium income citizens
You’ve helped create over 50 dwellings for your high income citizens.
You’ve helped create over 100 Religious buildings across the Empire.
You’ve helped create over 100 Culture centric buildings across the Empire
You’ve helped create over 50 Educational buildings across the Empire
You’ve helped create over 80 Health centric buildings across the Empire.
You’ve helped create over 50 Entertainment centric buildings across the Empire
You’ve helped create over 50 Security centric buildings across the Empire.
Your outstanding administrative skills have helped create more than 300,000 Denar for the Empire. Your skills and expertise in financial matters are well known.
You’ve completed over 20 separate missions for the Senate. This outstanding accomplishment solidifies you as the most reliable and sought after administrator in the Empire.
Played 30 minutes or more of sandbox mode in a single game
Played 45 minutes or more of sandbox mode in a single game
Earn at least 50,000 Denari in a single sandbox game
Earn at least 100,000 Denari in a single sandbox game
Earn at least 4,000 Denari a month in a sandbox game
Earn at least 7,000 Denari a month in a sandbox game
Played 15 minutes or more of sandbox mode in a single game

You’ve built over 60 African religious based buildings. These buildings connect the locals to their ancestors and help guide them. Your support for these people and their religious beliefs are well known

You’ve helped create over 50 Administrative buildings across your settlements
You’ve helped create over 50 culture centric buildings for the Gauls. Your support and understanding of the needs of the locals has helped solidify trust and appreciation

You've established over 50 religious buildings for the Gaulish people. These religious icons are paramount to the support of the locals and providing them has helped to solidify their trust in the Empire
You’ve approved the creation of over 50 Gaulishing security buildings. Training soldiers to protect their tribe and investing in their security has earned you respect from the local Chieftains
You’ve failed your first mission from the Senate. The Senate hopes this will be your one and only failure
An adapt agricultural planner, you've collected a range of raw agricultural resources for your settlements
You’ve created an assortment of bread, wine, olive oil and other highly required agricultural foodstuffs for your people.
You’ve worked hard to found mines and excavation sites to pull from the earth a range of iron, stone, clay and other prized raw resources.
You’ve helped create an assortment of highly refined industrial goods for your settlements. Your industrial planning knows no limits
You’ve facilitated the creation of a diverse assortment of luxury goods for your citizens. Pottery, Statues, Artworks and a whole host of highly desired resources.
